caseTitle: Federation of Pakistan through Secretary Establishment Division, Islamabad v. Misri Ladhani and others
tagline: (1) Discussion on Section 9 of the Civil Servants Act, 1973, Sub-Clause (b) of Rule 2, Rule 7 & 8 of the Civil Servants APT Rules, 1973. (2) The recommendations of the CSB are not binding, the competent authority may accept, reject or refer back the matter to the CSB for reconsideration. Ref: Sl.No.182 & 192 of Estacode. (3) Distinction between eligibility and fitness for promotion.
